Local NGOs still rely on manual tracking, making it difficult to identify at-risk students early or measure program impact effectively.

x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

EduTrack leverages ServiceNow to monitor and mentor girls’ education:

  • App Engine Studio for student profiles, attendance logs, and mentorship programs
  • HRSD and Employee Center repurposed for student onboarding and well-being check-ins
  • Flow Designer for attendance alerts and mentorship scheduling
  • Performance Analytics for dropout trend analysis
  • IntegrationHub for SMS alerts to parents

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

Integration with an SMS gateway for attendance alerts and mentor updates and a mobile network provider education API to enable mobile-based learning access and data synchronization.

 
 
 

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Ensuring community and school cooperation
  • Managing incomplete data entries
  • Designing child-safe privacy controls
